author: potuz
content: This is good. I think any aggregation is useful. If there's any correlation between voting patterns of clients that would be nice. When there's an orphan block, did most prysm nodes vote for the orphaned one and LightHouse for the canonical one or was it just random. Are Nimbus nodes likely to vote late for blocks proposed by lighthouse or not, etc... If there's a split along client lines in the form of a consensus bug it'll be obvious. But there may be some peering issues that may lead to a statistically skewed voting and seeing this could be very interesting
